data.persona: I am a farmer.  I grow wheat for the kingdom.  Most of the wheat is used to make bread.  I sell much of it to bakers.
data.description:
You are in the Castle courtyard bazaar.
There are tents set up everywhere flying family crest banners, the area is thronged with people wearing rough clothing, knights in half armor, children running around begging pennies for sweetmeats. The smell of roasting meat is rich in the air and the crowd grows louder with each passing hour due to the various vendors selling mead and wine.
There's a roasting meat, a shield, a rough clothing, a wine, a sweetmeat, and a banner here.
The thief and the vendor are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a clothes, and wielding a hoe for digging.

data.short_motivation: I must stop the thief before he gets away
data.mid_motivation: I want to make sure the thief is punished severely for his crimes
data.long_motivation: I want to discourage other youngsters from becoming thieves

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get stolen items back from thief
